Package com.github.yeetmanlord.bedwars_zeta.api.bedwars_menus.items

Interface IMenuItem

All Known Subinterfaces:
ICustomMenuItem
All Known Implementing Classes:
com.github.yeetmanlord.bedwars_zeta.api.impl.menus.items.shop.BuyableShopItem, CustomNonBuyableShopItem, CustomShopItem, CustomUpgradeItem, ExampleBuyableItem, ExampleCustomUpgradeItem, ExampleNonBuyableItem, ShopItem, UpgradeItem
public interface IMenuItem

  • Method Details

    • write

      void write()
      This method is called to write the item to the config file. Override this method to write custom data to the config file.

    • getSlot

      int getSlot()
      Returns:
      The slot of this item in the menu

    • getPageNum

      int getPageNum()
      Returns:
      The page number this item is on

    • processClick

      void processClick(PlayerUtil util)
      This method is called when the item is clicked in the menu. Override this method to add custom functionality to your item.
      Parameters:
      util - The PlayerUtil to use for input

    • getDisplayStack

      ItemStack getDisplayStack()
      Returns:
      The itemstack to show in this item's respective menu

    • getSQLData

      Row getSQLData()
      Override this method in your custom IMenuItem to ensure this writes into the database. The row type extends the HashMap type and condenses HashMap<String, SQLValue<?>> down just for ease of use
      Returns:
      Returns a list of all data values to put into the SQL table
